roleset.name: period of inactivity

example.name: dormancy-n
example.text: We can observe completion of germination of a single seed as an all-or-nothing event, whereas dormancy of a single seed can have any value between all (maximum dormancy) and nothing (non-dormancy).

example.name: dormant-j
example.text: Pinatubo , located 90 km from Manila , had been dormant for 600 years before the 1991 eruption , which ranks as one of the largest eruptions in this century .
example.arg: before the 1991 eruption , which ranks as one of the largest eruptions in this century

roleset.note: DORMANCY-N, DORMANT-J NOTES: Added by Julia for earthquakes
